DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Effect Bimosiamose Ozone Induced Sputum Neutrophilia
DOC.criteria: Able produce sputum normal sputum neutrophil level screen ( < 65 % nonepithelial cell ) . Ozone responsive , define ≥ 20 % relative increase sputum neutrophil cell count 3 h ozone challenge . At screen FEV1 least 80 % predict . Smokers ( use tobacco product previous 3 month ) . Urine cotinine level measure screening subject . Smokers define subject report recent tobacco use and/or urine cotinine ≥ 500 ng/mL . Significant illness within two week prior dose ( e.g. , infection ) . Recent ( within last three year ) and/or recurrent history acute chronic bronchospastic disease ( include asthma chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , treat treat ) .
